content.description: Directions: You will hear a brief exchange between two people. From the four choices printed, choose the most appropriate remark that the first speaker could make in response to the remark of the second speaker.
content.question: NOW GET READY FOR THE BRIEF EXCHANGE.

choices.label: Ach so—na dann viel Glück heute!

content.answer: Ach so—na dann viel Glück heute!

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
